mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from WMSOrderProcResult wo left join wmsorderlist w on wo.pagecode = w.ListCode where ResultTime > '${startTime}' and ResultTime < '${endTime}' and busitype = '21'

select top(#{limit}) pagecode,CORPNAME,ResultTime,CorpType from WMSOrderProcResult wo left join wmsorderlist w on wo.pagecode = w.ListCode left join clientunit c on w.Custom = c.ClientID where BusiType = 21 and ResultTime > '${startTime}' and ResultTime < '${endTime}' AND pageCode not IN ( SELECT top(#{offset}) pageCode from WMSOrderProcResult wo left join wmsorderlist w on wo.pagecode = w.ListCode where ResultTime > '${startTime}' and ResultTime < '${endTime}' and BusiType = 21 ) order by ResultTime desc
